Package Application

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class which implements the whole application, it has a list of administrators, a list of users, a list of offers and a list of houses.
    Author:
    Javier Delgado del Cerro, Javier Lopez Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:
        List of application's RegisteredUsers.

      • addAdmin

        public boolean addAdmin(Administrator admin)
        Method that adds an administrator to the array of the system.
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator to be added.
        Returns:
        boolean true if it was added successfully, false otherwise.

      • getAdmins

        public java.util.List<Administrator> getAdmins()

        Returns:
        List of application's Administrators.

        Returns:
        List of application's Houses.

      • getOffers

        public java.util.List<Offer> getOffers()
        Return the list of Offer on the application.
        Returns:
        List of application's Offers.

      • login

        public int login(java.lang.String id,
                 java.lang.String password)
        Method that logs in a user or an administrator so that they can use the application.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the user or administrator that is going to log in.
        password - password of the user or administrator that is going to log in.
        Returns:
        int which is 1 if everything is correct, -1 if the password does not match the id, or -2 if the id cannot be found.

      • searchLoggedIn

        public java.lang.Object searchLoggedIn()
        Method that searches for the user or administrator who is logged in.
        Returns:
        Administrator or RegisteredUser logged in casted as Object.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Method that logs out the user or administrator that is currently logged in.

      • addHouse

        public boolean addHouse(java.lang.String id)
        Method that creates a new house and adds it to the application's list, and into the host's houses list, making sure that the user is not a guest.
        Parameters:
        id - of the new house to add.
        Returns:
        boolean to check if the house was correctly added or not.

      • addHouse

        public boolean addHouse(java.lang.String id,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> chars)
        Method that creates a new house with its characteristics and adds it to the application's list, and into the host's houses list, making sure that the user is not a guest.
        Parameters:
        id - of the new house to add.
        chars - Characteristics of the house.
        Returns:
        boolean to check if the house was correctly added or not.

      • cancelOffer

        public void cancelOffer(Offer o)
                 throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Method that is used by the host to cancel his own offer if it is not reserved or bought yet.
        Parameters:
        o - Offer to cancel.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - Exception that indicates that the offer is already reserved or bought, or that the user who tries to cancel it is not the host of the offer.

      • seeNonApprovedOffer

        public java.util.List<Offer> seeNonApprovedOffer()
        Method that selects from the offers array the ones that are not approved yet.
        Returns:
        List with the offer that are waiting to be approved.

      • seeBannedUsers

        public java.util.List<RegisteredUser> seeBannedUsers()
        Method that selects from all the users the ones who are banned.
        Returns:
        List of all the banned users.

      • addOffer

        public boolean addOffer(double deposit,
                        double totalPrice,
                        java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                        java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                        House house,
                        RegisteredUser host)
        Method that creates a new holiday offer, and adds it to the offers array, and to the host created offers list, making sure that the user is not a guest.
        Parameters:
        deposit - Deposit of the offer.
        totalPrice - Price of the offer (without the deposit).
        startDate - Starting date of the offer.
        endDate - Ending date of the offer.
        house - House in which the guest will stay if he buys the offer.
        host - User that created the offer
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the offer was successfully added or not.

      • addOffer

        public boolean addOffer(double deposit,
                        double pricePerMonth,
                        java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                        House house,
                        RegisteredUser host)
        Method that creates a new living offer with the default number of months, and adds it to the offers array and to the host created offers list, making sure that the user is not a guest.
        Parameters:
        deposit - Deposit of the offer.
        pricePerMonth - Price to be paid per month to the host in order to buy the offer.
        startDate - Starting day of the offer.
        house - House in which the guest will stay if he buys the offer.
        host - User that created the offer.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the offer was successfully added or not.

      • addOffer

        public boolean addOffer(double deposit,
                        double pricePerMonth,
                        java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                        House house,
                        RegisteredUser host,
                        int nMonths)
        Method that creates a new living offer with a number of months, and adds it to the offers array and to the host created offers list, making sure that the user is not a guest.
        Parameters:
        deposit - Deposit of the offer.
        pricePerMonth - Price to be paid per month to the host in order to buy the offer.
        startDate - Starting day of the offer.
        house - House in which the guest will stay if he buys the offer.
        host - User that created the offer.
        nMonths - number of months the offer has.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the offer was successfully added or not.

      • validOffer

        public boolean validOffer(LivingOffer offer)
        Method that checks if a LivingOffer is valid in the application. (It is not included already, and there is no other LivingOffer in the same house at the same time period).
        Parameters:
        offer - Offer to check.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if it's valid or not.

      • validOffer

        public boolean validOffer(HolidayOffer offer)
        Method that checks if a HolidayOffer is valid in the application. (It is not included already, and there is no other HolidayOffer in the same house at the same time period).
        Parameters:
        offer - Offer to check.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if it's valid or not.

      • searchByZIP

        public java.util.List<Offer> searchByZIP(java.lang.String zip)
        Method that selects from all the offers the one with the given ZIP code.
        Parameters:
        zip - ZIP code of the requested offers.
        Returns:
        List of the offers with the given ZIP code.

      • searchByDate

        public java.util.List<Offer> searchByDate(java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                          java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        Method that selects all the offers that start between 2 given dates.
        Parameters:
        startDate - Date in which the given date range starts.
        endDate - Date in which the given date range ends.
        Returns:
        List of the offers between the 2 given dates.

      • searchByType

        public java.util.List<Offer> searchByType(int offerType)
        Method that selects all the offers with the given type (living or holiday).
        Parameters:
        offerType - int that indicates the type of offer.
        Returns:
        List of the offers of the given type.

      • searchByRating

        public java.util.List<Offer> searchByRating(double rating)
        Method that selects the offers which have a rating equal or superior to the one given.
        Parameters:
        rating - Minimum rating the offer has to have in order to be selected.
        Returns:
        List of offers with an equal or superior rating than the one provided.

      • searchReservedOffers

        public java.util.List<Offer> searchReservedOffers()
        Method that selects all the offers that are reserved.
        Returns:
        List of the offers that are reserved.

      • searchBoughtOffers

        public java.util.List<Offer> searchBoughtOffers()
        Method that selects all the offers that are bought.
        Returns:
        List of the offers that are bought.

      • loadFromFile

        private static Application loadFromFile(java.lang.String file)
        Method that loads all the system from a backup file, if the file does not exist yet it loads the first users from the file initial_data.txt. Once the file is restored, we remove the not valid offers or update them. For example if the guest reserved the offer but after five days he has not paid it, the offer is marked as available and removed from the user's reserved/bought offers. If the offer is not valid and it is a holiday offer, it is removed from the system, otherwise, it is marked as denied and stored.
        Parameters:
        file - String with the name of the backup file.
        Returns:
        The loaded application

      • saveToFile

        private void saveToFile(java.lang.String file)
        Method that saves all the application's data into a backup file.
        Parameters:
        file - String with the name of the backup file.

      • getWindow

        public static WindowInterface getWindow()
        Method that allows us to change the Application window reference.
        Returns:
        the current Application's WindowInterface.

      • setWindow

        public static void setWindow(WindowInterface window)
        Method that allows us to change the Application window reference.
        Parameters:
        window - New WindowInterface.
